    Map​(int x, int y, int DRAWING_WIDTH, int DRAWING_HEIGHT)

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map​(int x, int y, int DRAWING_WIDTH, int DRAWING_HEIGHT)
      Recommended constructor, constructs map to specified dimentions, border will be initialized based on length and width specifications.
      Parameters:
      x - length of field.
      y - width of field.

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, Mech player)
      To draw the objects in the map including the player. Everything should be drawn relative to player position.
      Parameters:
      surface - game window where the objects should be drawn.
      player - Mech player with which the view is configured to.
